meta.author: Ted Drake, Yahoo! Inc.

sampleQuery.description: View FCC license counts and percent distribution by status for Verizon Wireless

meta.sampleQuery: select * from {table} where commonName="Verizon Wireless" and limit="3"
meta.description: This API returns the license counts and percent distribution by status. A license falls into one of the following statuses: active, expired, cancelled or terminated.
